snippet: The Yankees maintained their one-game lead over the Orioles in the American League East thanks to a Curtis Granderson two-run home run in the sixth inning.
abstract: New York Yankees defeat Atlanta Braves, 3-2, to maintain their one-game lead in the American League East.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees maintained their one-game lead over the Orioles in the American League East thanks to a Curtis Granderson two-run home run in the sixth inning.

headline.seo: Granderson Home Run Lifts Yankees Past Braves
headline.main: Yankees, Playing Like a First-Place Team, Win Their Sixth Straight
headline.print_headline: Yankees, Playing Like a First-Place Team, Win Their Sixth Straight
